EmailTemplate.name: INTERNAL - Offboarding Kick-Off
EmailTemplate.subject: OFFBOARDING: KickOff
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Christina,
This is to inform you that we have terminated the cooperation with the following customer: [CUSTOMER NAME]
1. [REJECTION / TERMINATION]
Status: [Pre go-live / post go-live] Termination Notification Date: Reason for Termination:
2. TO DO's by Customer Success:
nothing
[or]
SUP: deactivate customer in Django/SF LOG: cancel pick ups and send back documents PAR: de-register employees and/or conduct payroll ACC/PIO: MEC needs to be done
Best,
{{{Sender.FirstName}}}
